statements: SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT record_id, drone_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT technician_name, service_cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT description FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-10-05';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 5;
SELECT technician_name, service_cost FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, service_cost ASC;
SELECT AVG(service_cost) AS average_cost, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT technician_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY technician_name HAVING total_records > 10;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_cost, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT drone_id, COUNT(*) FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY drone_id;
SELECT drone_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM drones ORDER BY last_service_date DESC, total_flights ASC;
SELECT * FROM drones ORDER BY last_service_date DESC, total_flights ASC;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, battery_level FROM drones WHERE battery_level < 50;
SELECT drone_model, COUNT(*) AS total_maintenance FROM drones JOIN maintenance_records ON drones.drone_id = maintenance_records.drone_id GROUP BY drone_model;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, total_flights FROM drones WHERE total_flights BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY total_flights DESC;
SELECT maintenance_type, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_cost FROM maintenance_records GROUP BY maintenance_type HAVING total_cost > 5000;
SELECT * FROM DroneMaintenanceRecord;
SELECT drone_id, maintenance_date, description FROM DroneMaintenanceRecord ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Drone WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT technician_id, technician_name, specialty FROM Technician WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, purchase_date FROM Drone ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM DroneMaintenanceRecord WHERE technician_id = 1;
SELECT drone_id, status FROM Drone WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT technician_name, specialty, experience_years FROM Technician ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT drone_id, drone_model, purchase_date, last_serviced FROM Drone WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM DroneMaintenanceRecord WHERE description LIKE '%repair%';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM drone_details ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, servicing_personnel, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT manufacturer, model, purchase_date FROM drone_details WHERE warranty_expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, servicing_personnel FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';

SELECT r.record_id, r.repair_type, r.repair_date, d.manufacturer, d.model FROM repair_records r JOIN maintenance_records m ON r.record_id = m.record_id JOIN drone_details d ON m.drone_id = d.drone_id;
SELECT s.* FROM service_history s JOIN maintenance_records m ON s.record_id = m.record_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'inspection' ORDER BY s.servicing_date DESC;

SELECT m.record_id, m.maintenance_type, d.manufacturer, d.model, s.servicing_date FROM maintenance_records m JOIN drone_details d ON m.drone_id = d.drone_id JOIN service_history s ON m.record_id = s.record_id;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_name, drone_model, last_service_date FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT drone_id, technician_id, assignment_date FROM drone_technicians WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE repair_type = 'Electrical' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_name, drone_model, last_service_date FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT technician_name, technician_specialty FROM technicians ORDER BY technician_specialty ASC;
SELECT drone_id, drone_name, last_service_date, service_due_date FROM drones WHERE last_service_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY last_service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records JOIN drones ON maintenance_records.drone_id = drones.drone_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'routine';
